Scenario.ref: A user should be able to search for a Pet owner entering the Last Name of the owner

TestCase.ref: The Owner Name -Owner_Name- _ Owner Address -Owner_Address-_ Owner City -Owner_City- and Owner Telephone -Owner_Telephone- appear under _Owner Information_ section
The Pet Name -Pet_Name-_ Pet DOB -Pet_Birth_Date-_ Pet Type -Pet_Type- appear under _Pets and Visits_ section
The user enters a valid Last Name -Search_Last_Name- of the PetOwner
The user enters an invalid Last Name -Search_Last_Name- of the PetOwner
The user navigates to the _Find Owners_ screen of the PetClinic portal
The webpage shows an error message -error_message-
